original_text: Thus saith the Lord, The people which were left of the sword found grace in the wilderness; even Israel, when I went to cause him to rest.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시니라 칼에서 벗어난 백성이 광야에서 은혜를 입었나니 곧 내가 이스라엘로 안식을 얻게 하러 갈 때에라

sentences.original_text: The people which were left of the sword
when I went to cause him to rest
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그에게 안식을 주러 갔을 때라
